title: 命令方块大神过来！
author: 幻狱
txt_content:
怎么用指令给装备加附魔+生命值+无法破坏+多条lore？
 
在这里求一下大神怎么在单人游戏上弄出上面这样的装备？
 
 
还有，我要的是指令，不要给我别的帖子地址！

replies.author: egg_apple
博中
replies.txt_content:
博中 发表于 2016-10-29 14:33
你试试吧
/give Bo_Zhong minecraft:wooden_sword 1 0 {Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{AttrinuteNam ...
把 “Bo_Zhong”换成 @a

replies.author: egg_apple
幻狱
replies.txt_content:
egg_apple 发表于 2016-10-29 15:53
/give @a minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount ...
是1.8的，求发

replies.author: 逗神·雷疯
replies.txt_content: /give @a 1 0 minecraft:物品ID {ench:[id:附魔名称,lvl:等级],display:{Lore:["你想写啥写啥"]},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1701307879,UUIDMost:1701307879,Amount:血量数量,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}],Unbreakable:1}
